text: Allah unkalukku oru tinkilaikkum patcattil atai nikka avanait tavira marrevaralum mutiyatu. Avan unkalukku oru nanmaiyai natinal avanutaiya akkarunaiyait tataiceyya evaralum mutiyatu. Avan atiyarkalil avan virumpiyavarkalukke atai alikkiran. Avan mikka mannippavan, mikak karunaiyutaiyavan avan
